message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. Given its immense potential impact on your success, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a game-changing asset at a price that reflects both its quality and the value it can add to your organization. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making a decision.
